DESCRIPTION: Can be placed at equipment slot and be activated by right-clicking.
Bleeding target loses #b1 HP after being attacked.
Slowdowned target deals less damage and takes more damage.
Target restores HP at the start and the end of its turn if regen is above 0. Otherwise, it loses HP.
Attack modifies card's damage differently when it's above 0 or not.
The damage finally dealt that's #b150% times more than original damage will be considered as Crit.
